title: Creat a contact group
answer:
Add a contact to a contact group 

 In main screen, clicking ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111284) to enter the contacts list; 

 Clicking the corresponding contact to enter the details; 

 Clicking![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111285),clicking the name of group or creating new group to choose the group you want to join. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111286)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111287)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111288)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111289)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111290)

 Add some contacts to a contact group 

 In main screen, clicking ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111291) to enter the contacts list; 

 Switching to edit interface,entering the group and clicking the name of group to check the group. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111292)

 [Note:]() 

 Only support add the contact in phone to group 

 Donâ€™t support add the contact in SIM card to group
